Articles.Content:
The Hard Challenge- Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to complete the challenges below in a quick manner ON HARD MODE.

Scoring- The challenges each have a score that you receive for completing them. This is multiplied by the multiplier once you are done with the challenge. Highest score wins. Can only complete a challenge once. Multipliers added together THEN multiplied. Screenshots necessary.

Challenges-

Orbit! Achieve a stable orbit. (10 pts)

Take me to the Mun. Achieve lunar orbit.(25 pts)

The Big Mint. Orbit Minmus (25 pts)

Live to die another day. Complete the challenges shown above without killing or stranding a single kerbal (30 pts).

Its Mun time! Land on the Mun (38 pts)

Not very yummy... Land on Minmus (35 pts)

Expert Lander. Do not kill or strand a single Kerbal while completing the challenges above. (40 pts)

Lots o' rocks. Capture and asteroid. (45 pts)

Aliens! Land on another planet (60 pts)

Entirely inhabited by robots... Send a rover to Duna (65 pts)

Some good old fun! Land a rover on the Mun or Minmus (45 pts)

Driving all day long. Send a rover to another planet other then Duna. (65 pts)

Manned mission. Send a Kerbal to another planet and return. (75 pts)

Tylo. Land on Tylo (100 pts)

Savior. Do not kill or strand a single Kerbal throughout this entire challenge. (125 pts)

Expert. Complete every challenge. (200 pts)

Create a space station. Create a space station. (30 pts)

Multipliers-

Time-

Time taken under 5 years X2

Time taken under 4 years X3

Time taken under 3 years X4

Time taken under 2 years x5

Challenges-

Complete Expert Challenge- X2

Complete Savior Challenge- X2

Misc-

Complete Tech Tree-X2

Play with Realism overhaul X3

Play with Real Solar System mod X3

***If you want me to add something in the misc section, tell me in the comments!!!***

Rules-

This works in large part on an honor system. Standard rules apply. Show me screenshots for proof. Use only required and allowed mods. Use only hard mode.

Required mods-

Remote Tech

TAC life support

DRE

FAR

Allowed mods-

Most non-game changing mods (Engineer redux, Kerbal alarm clock, etc...) No part mods. Ask me if you are unsure.

Mods that make the game harder in any way (RSS, Realism overhaul, etc...)

Well guys, have fun. I am about to start the challenge myself. If you want me to add something tell me in the comments. I'll answer any questions you have!

Edited October 27, 2014 by Fireking883

Seems like an interesting challenge. I was thinking of starting up a YouTube series with hard mode on. So reserved for entry

Also, with the 'allowed mods', couldn't you add 'any mod that makes the game harder'? You could add bonus challenges with planet factory, for example.
Yes, actually I was thinking about adding a bonus for adding a mod that makes the game harder. I probably will add some challenges based on it too.
